name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Cook pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with spaghetti.

name: Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef. Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, cheese, and tomatoes.

name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Cook chicken in spices. Add tomatoes and cream. Simmer until cooked through.

name: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Marinate paneer and vegetables in yogurt and spices. Skewer and grill until charred.

name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Layer with partially cooked rice and cook on low heat until done.

name: Enchiladas
instructions: Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese. Roll and place in a dish, cover with sauce and cheese, then bake.

name: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados. Mix with lime juice, diced onions, tomatoes, and chopped cilantro.

name: Lasagna
instructions: Layer noodles with meat, ricotta, and marinara. Top with mozzarella. Bake until bubbly.

name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough. Top with mozzarella and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and bake.
